adjective.description: Relating to or characteristic of the English town of Stratford or its inhabitants.
Relating to the view that William Shakespeare was the author of the plays typically attributed to him.

noun.description: A native or inhabitant of the English town of Stratford.
examples: she was one of 21 Stratfordians who were reported to the ecclesiastical court

noun.description: A supporter of the view that William Shakespeare was the author of the plays typically attributed to him.
examples: the Stratfordians remained unmoved from their position
